amendment.description: Amendment expresses the Sense of Congress that the Department of Transportation and the States should provide additional incentives to encourage the purchase and use of hybrid and other fuel efficient vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-15 to express the Sense of Congress that the Department of Transportation and the States should provide additional incentives to encourage the purchase and use of hybrid and other fuel efficient vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
